QuestData.Title: Journey to Ardenweald
QuestData.Description:
The warning you received from the Primus needs to reach the Winter Queen of Ardenweald, $n. The Eternal Ones must stand together against the coming darkness.
The Winter Queen oversees the cycle between Death and Life. In her forest slumber ancient spirits of nature that must be reborn.
I fear the anima drought will have taken an especially grim toll upon her realm.
The night fae can lead you to the Queen. Bring her this message, and she will know what needs to be done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Ardenweald and find someone to take you to the Winter Queen.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lady Moonberry in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText:
We haven't seen anyone come through the gateway in a very long time! Certainly not someone like you.
What brings you to Ardenweald?
